_meta.description: Definitions for cost calculation methodologies used in commercial data
_meta.notes: Methodologies describe HOW weekly running costs and other figures are calculated

reddit-standard.name: Reddit Grosses Analysis
reddit-standard.description: Standard methodology used by Reddit r/Broadway Grosses Analysis posts
reddit-standard.calculation: Weekly gross minus estimated operating expenses, which may or may not include theater's ~9% cut
reddit-standard.notes: Estimates can vary based on whether analyst includes theater cut (~9%), producer's fee, royalty pools, or marketing costs

trade-reported.name: Trade Press Reported
trade-reported.description: Figures reported by trade publications (Deadline, Variety, Broadway News)
trade-reported.calculation: Typically based on producer statements or industry sources
trade-reported.notes: Usually more accurate than estimates but may be selective (e.g., only reported when favorable)

sec-filing.name: SEC Form D Filing
sec-filing.description: Official capitalization from SEC Form D securities filings
sec-filing.calculation: Total amount of securities offered to investors
sec-filing.notes: Most reliable source for capitalization figures. Required for securities offerings over $1M

producer-confirmed.name: Producer Confirmed
producer-confirmed.description: Figures directly confirmed by producers or lead producers
producer-confirmed.notes: Rare but most authoritative when available

deep-research.name: Deep Research Verified
deep-research.description: Extensively researched and cross-referenced from multiple authoritative sources
deep-research.notes: Reserved for data that has been manually verified through extensive research

industry-estimate.name: Industry Estimate
industry-estimate.description: General industry estimate based on comparable shows
industry-estimate.calculation: Based on theater size, cast size, production complexity
industry-estimate.notes: Use only when no other data available

compatibility._description: Which methodologies can be meaningfully compared for contradiction detection
